participant_1.background:
I like music that reminds me of my family and friends.
I miss my dog, but I have a new friend in my cat.
I will go to Comic Con if I can wear my favorite hoodie.
I try to stay active and keep my mind busy to avoid feeling anxious.
I'd love to have lunch with George Lucas and talk about the powers of crystals in Star Wars.

participant_2.background:
I am retired and enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
i enjoy watching tennis and golf on tv.
i have two pitt bulls.
i have been to a few renaissance fairs.
I am a social butterfly and love to meet new people, but I'd be terrible at being a tour guide.

content.text: Hey there! Not much, just relaxing at home.
Sounds like a good way to spend a day! I'm about to head to Comic Con!
That sounds like fun! Have you been before?
A few times. I always have a great time.
What are you looking forward to seeing/doing the most?
I'm excited to check out all the new Marvel stuff. And I always like to go to the panels.
Oh yeah, the panels are always a lot of fun. I'm not really into Marvel, so I'll probably just be wandering around and seeing what catches my eye.
That sounds like a good way to do it too. There's always so much to see and do.
Yeah, I'm sure I'll find something to keep me entertained.
Well, have fun! I'll be sure to post some pics on social media.
Thanks, I will! And you too!
